airland.title: AirLand
airland.brief: Fictitious shop specialized in Nike Air Force sneakers...
airland.details: Fictitious shop specialized in Nike Air Force sneakers. Built with React, featuring a responsive design, backend with Node.js and database integration with Firebase...

geo-quizzes.title: Geography Quizzes
geo-quizzes.brief: Learn geography by playing games of finding countries...
geo-quizzes.details: Website made for learning geography by playing games of finding countries and selecting the correct flag on several quizzes, supporting an interactive map and several languages.
